shortDescription: Set and save the savedata of the game.
longDescription: The data can be 2KB large maximum!!
notes: The save ID using the `SaveID` method has to be set first!
**IMPORTANT:** due to a nasty bug in V1.1.0 and before, the savedata is **not saved**. Thanks to me, the ~~stupid~~ smart LIKO-12 developer.

arguments.name: data
arguments.description: The new savedata of the game.
